title: Devourer on Vi
body: Has anybody tried out the new devourer on Vi? I know a lot of people like to have her as Cinderhulk or Warrior's, but I tried out devourer and it stacks REALLY well with a rushed lvl 3 W and building some damage/tank after that.

replies.body: it dominates mid game if you can get sated by 20. But it loses her early gank pressure. I often build and have been having success but it is wholly dependent on how well your lanes do. If your lanes fail, you will fail.

well if you q in, you will still need to e twice, sated devourer or not, to proc w the first time, after that if you can really still stick to your target you are only really doing 10% of their max hp every 2 hits which may sound like a lot of damage but it really isn't since it is physical damage. Also you will be really squishy easy, with no real decent damage either.
Q>Auto>E sets off the passive, and Sated would make that be 4 Auto's worth of W so it's worthless in that aspect.
yeah thats what i was saying

It would be significantly worse in the early-mid game. Maybe alright if youre only hitting tanks and they cant kite you. Warrior is better burst though and usually youre going for squishies with vi anyway so warrior will still be better if you want a damage item.

It'd be one of those Niche things like Full AD Vi, especially since barring BC your on hit build is very limited (which is what devourer loves to have with it.)

Vi is strong early game, and giving her a devourer would delay the spike which she usually gets from her enchantment, and this is a fairly heavy thing to be giving up on a Vi.

Late game you will still face similar problems with Vi being mostly CC/tank unless your going Full AD sort of thing in which case you will be an extra assassin, however the main problem with this is that because her Q doesn't count as an Auto, she might not be the best champion to have with devourers.

Also delaying your Q leveling also gives you other problems, but those are rectified since you'd be looking at more of a farm playstyle then a gank playstyle being that you have a devourers.
